name: Machines & Modules & Motion
description:
Small puzzle game for GMTK 2020.

You can only move when you have the designated modules attached to slots. These modules can also be inserted into nearby machines for an "out of control" puzzle-solving experience.

Features an open-ended, unknown story of a derelict drone wandering through 11 abandoned areas.

The main controls are the mouse and 'WASD'.

Disclaimer: In the rare case that the game crashes, please try again! The game handles fairly well if your inputs are determined.

Bug: The game softlocks if you place the life-module into the wrong machine. You have to go out of your way to do this, though -- just don't put it into machines that are supposed to move!
